CustomField.formula: IF( EmailAfterSendDatePassed__c, IF( EmailAfterSent__c, '‚úÖ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_Sent, IF( AND(EmailAfterConfirmation__c, NOT(EmailAfterSent__c)), '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_CancelledCourse, IF( Cancel__c, '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_CancelledCourse, IF( EmailAfterConfirmation__c, IF( TODAY() = EmailAfterDate__c, IF( TIMENOW() >= TIMEVALUE("18:00:00.000"), '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_SendError, '‚è≥ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_Scheduled ), '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_SendError ), 'üí§ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_NotScheduled ) ) ) ), '' )
CustomField.label: Status
